data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Le Trinité, Martinique today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Le Trinité, Martinique
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Le Trinité, Martinique the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Le Trinité.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Le Trinité to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Le Robert
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Le Robert, Le Trinité, Martinique.
Father, help the 884 believers in Le Trinité to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Le Trinité, Martinique.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Le Trinité, Martinique has a population of 12,800.

We estimate Le Trinité has 884 people who might know Jesus, 11,258 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 658 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 14 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Le Trinité, Martinique.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.
